name: INKODED [Prototype]
description:
Inkoded is a tiny slice of test gameplay/puzzles of an idea I had for a hacking/stealth/infiltration game, set in the cleaner, expensive, corporate parts of a cyberpunk world, where you are sent in to Hitman-esque levels with a Tech Tattoo.

Configure your Tech Tattoo in hidden places, interfere with frequency signals, override access-level doors, swipe codes from unattended smartphones, boost your perceived social standing, or become invisible to deal with an obstacle.

Inspired hugely by Watch_Dogs and old MS DOS interfaces. The small but working prototype puzzle has multiple solutions of varying complexity.
